resources.string: Last night of the Furore will be the DJ night. The best part of the fest. The electronic music ll rock and tune your hearts.

(S)haan is the youngest DJ to play in an international music festival. At age 15, he debuted at Asia’s premier music festival – Sunburn 2010, in Goa, India. He is the new kid on the Dance Scene and has played to many packed houses across India and in London.

In only his first year of playing, (S)haan quickly jumped from opening sets for Funk Agenda and Helium Project, to touring with Miss Nine. (S)haan’s progressive house set attracted thousands of Sunburners, and was unofficially ranked one of the top five favorite sets of the festival. Shaan has played at the biggest festivals in Asia, alongside the biggest names in the industry – Avicii, Afrojack, David Guetta, Hardwell, Swedish House Mafia, Tiesto, Dash Berlin, Michael Woods, to name a few. He proved his mettle in the international market as well, playing for a Global Truce public awareness concert and for an exclusive gig on a private yacht on Temple Pier, London, and at the SUNBURN International Festival in Colombo. Shaan is a SUNBURN Artist and headlines tours Asia on Club and Campus Tours.

Rohan’s style of playing music is quite unique. While he specializes in playing Progressive House, Rohan is capable at spinning wicked tunes across all genres and is capable of keeping a party rocking with ease. He does this by reading crowds and adapts his performance to suit his audience rather than what he feels like listening to. His music tells a story and takes people through a journey as the night progresses.

He is a rapper, composer and producer.He is also a professional sound engineer. From the iconic crew Machas with attitude (MWA) . He ll blow your mind with his awesome and catchy lyrics coupled with groovy music.
Band with mix of all flavours. Its bled of best in all wings of music. Their uniqueness in giving fusing rock and folk ll reverberate your hearts with tune of pure awesomeness.
Hope to see you all there because its going to be one hell of a night you don’t want miss!

string.name: terms
string.a: By logging in through Facebook you agree to the Terms and Conditions

resources.string:
The winner ll get a free pass to DJ night and ll get a chance to take a selfie with the artist

RULES

You should upload your selfie or you should be there in the picture

The picture you upload ll also be uploaded to official facebook page of Furore 15

The ranking is measured by likes got to your picture in the app as well as on the photos uplaoded on facebook page (Furore 15)

The winner ll be announced on our facebook page
